node.title: Robbie Young made headlines as the target of a racist comment, but it's his off-field work that defines him
node.alt: Robbie Young leans against a painted wall with his arms folded
node.description: Footballer Robbie Young has carved out a reputation as being lightning-fast on the football field in both the AFL and SANFL, but it was a racist comment aimed at the small forward that made him a household name. Now, he's hoping his off-field work with children will change that.
node.content:
["Robbie Young has\u00a0carved out a reputation as being lightning-fast on the football field, kicking goals for St Kilda and more recently\u00a0in the SANFL, but it was a racist comment aimed at the small forward that saw his name hit the headlines.", "Young was identified as the target of a racist comment made by\u00a0Adelaide Crows veteran Taylor Walker\u00a0during a half-time huddle at a\u00a0SANFL match, sparking outrage\u00a0within the community.", "Walker was suspended by the AFL for six matches, and at the time said he was \"deeply ashamed\" that he made the comment.", "It also highlighted the ongoing issue of racism in football, with many former and current Indigenous players speaking out.\u00a0", "\"To think we're in the 21st century and this stuff is still occurring is pretty poor, but at the end of the day I'm a pretty forgiving guy,\" Young said.", "Indeed, Young was seen offering Walker comfort in an\u00a0apology video the Crows released\u00a0after the incident.\u00a0", "\"I knew [his apology] was pretty genuine and it was pretty touching.\"", "That was back in August, and Young is keen to move on.", "", "
Robbie Young with Year 7 students from Avenues College.(ABC News: Haidarr Jones\u00a0)
", "His focus now is on inspiring the next generation through his work as an Aboriginal community education officer.", "\"It's about putting a smile on a young person's face, you know, it's about giving a lot more than receiving,\" he said.", "\"I love being Uncle Robbie, or that role model that the kids can come to and speak about anything, and just be there to have fun and give them guidance.\"", "
Inspiring the next generation
", "Many noted his gracious handling of the incident\u00a0at the time, but he puts his resilience down to his childhood.", "\"But if I can tell the kids about my story, and if they take a little out of it, or a lot, then I feel like I've done my job.\"", "Young has been working with primary and high school students for the past six years, with one of his students, Xzavier McDonald, describing him as a \"big help.\"", "\"He helps me in class and if I get silly, he'll tell me to go outside and work, so I can get my act together,\" he said.", "Young is a proud Kaurna, Narrunga\u00a0and Ngarrindjeri man, and has not shied away from discussing the emotional impact of Walker's comment with his students.", "\"When it first happened, a lot of the kids came up to me and said, 'oh I saw you on the news', but they didn't really understand the severity of the issue,\" he said.", "\"Me going into some of the classes and speaking mainly to the year six and seven kids about racism and the effects it has on an individual \u2026 I think that was very important.\"", "
Leaving the SANFL to spend time with family
", "As for his footy career, he's leaving the SANFL \u2013 but insists it has nothing to do with racism in the sport.", "", "
Former North Adelaide Football Club player Robbie Young warms up before a game in August.(ABC News: Haidarr Jones)
", "\"I've got two girls now, and have another one due in March, so it's a lot to commit to when you're working full-time and you're going after work to training, which is basically another full-time job,\" he said.", "He will play a stint in country football, joining Tailem Bend Football Club in the River Murray league in 2022.", "\"I just want to be a bit of an icon down there, and fast track these kids in their skills and not letting talent go to waste.\"", "As for where he will be in five years' time? Doing exactly what he's doing now.", "\"Oh this is my dream job, I love working with youth and seeing kids reach their full potential,\" he said.", "\"If I can empower them to speak up when they need to then that's what I'll continue to do.\""]
